item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello. Just trying to see how well this works. Oh look, this theme supports code highlights too! const msg: string = "Howdy world!"; console.log(msg); That’s pretty awesome, actually. Let’s try something newer. for _ in 0..<10 { print("I love coding!") } Ok. That’s super cool.
